pages.text: 51|7|Savgand ʙa osmon, ki [ʙo sitoragon orosta suda va gui] doroi rohhost
51|8|Ki sumo [dar mavridi Pajomʙaru Qur'on] ixtilofi nazar dored
51|9|Har ki [az rohi haq] ʙozgardonda savad, az [imon ʙa] Pajomʙar va Qur'on niz ʙozgardonda xohad sud
51|10|Marg [va la'nat] ʙar duruƣgujon
51|11|Hamon kasone, ki dar vartai cahl ƣofiland
51|12|Onon [pajvasta va az ruji inkor] mepursand: «Ruzi cazo ci zamone ast?»
51|13|Hamon ruze ast, ki ʙa otas mucozot mesavand
51|14|[Va ʙa onon gufta mesavad:] «Azoʙi xudro ʙicased; in hamon otasest, ki ʙa sitoʙ mexosted»
51|15|[Dar ruzi qijomat] Musallaman, parhezkoron dar ʙoƣhoe [az ʙihist] va [kanori] casmasorho ʙa sar meʙarand
51|16|On ci Parvardigorason ʙa onon ato kardaast, darjoft medorand; zero dar [zindagii] guzasta nakukor ʙudaand
51|17|Onon andake az saʙro mexuftand [va ʙaqijaro ʙa namoz va nijois masƣul ʙudand]
51|18|Va sahargohon omurzis mexostand
51|19|Va dar amvolason ʙaroi soil va mahrum haqqe [muajjan az sadaqa va zakot] ʙud
51|20|Dar zamin nisonaho [-i qudrati ilohi] ʙaroi ahli jaqin padidor ast
51|21|va dar vucudi xudaton; ojo nameʙined
51|22|Va rizqu ruziaton va on ci [az kajfaru podos va xajru sar, ki] ʙa sumo va'da doda mesavad, dar osmon ast
51|23|Pas savgand ʙa Parvardigori osmonu zamin, ki va'da [-i qijomat va podos va azoʙ] hamcun suxan guftanaton haqiqi va qat'i ast
51|24|[Ej Pajomʙar] Ojo dostoni mehmononi giromii Iʙrohim ʙa tu rasidaast
51|25|Cun ʙar u vorid sudand va salom guftand, u guft: «Salom» [va zeri laʙ guft:] «Guruhe nosinosand»
51|26|On goh nazdi xonavodai xud raft va [gusti ʙirjoni] gusolai farʙehe [ʙaroi paziroi] ovard
51|27|[U ƣizoro] Nazdi onon guzost va [cand lahza ʙa'd] guft: «Ojo namexured?»
51|28|[Pas, cun dast ʙa ƣizo nazadand] Az onon ehsosi tars kard; guftand: «Natars [mo faristaem]; va uro ʙa [tavalludi] pisari dono ʙasorat dodand
51|29|Hamsaras ʙo farjod [-u sigifti] pes omad va dar hole ki ʙa ruji xud mezad, guft: «Pirazani nozo [farzand mezojad]
51|30|[Faristagon] guftand: «Parvardigorat cunin farmudaast; va ʙe gumon, U hakimu donost»
